## Check if packages are installed, and if not, install them

```{r}

packages <- c("knitr","tidyverse","gt","lubridate","wesanderson",
              "viridis","marelac","wql","qgam","mgcv","gratia",
              "modelr","EGRET","lmodel2","here","stats","patchwork",
              "betareg")

df <- packages %in% installed.packages()

print("The following required packages are not installed and should be installed using install.packages():\n")
print(packages[!df])

```
